review: It works great and fast but cannot use it here in Dominican Republic.Any suggestions?????
author: Oscar

review: This is amazing, especially if you already love using Amazon Prime. The only complaint I have is the parental control settings force you to enter your pin each and every time you use the stick. I wish there was some way to be more specific, like block adult content or rated R and above, use allow prime or free content to be viewed/played without entering the pin each time.
author: stabs

review: Makes watching Netflix and Amazon easy!
author: Michelle "book reviewer"

review: love it - easy to install, I have used Amazon Prime, Netflix and Hulu and all work great!
author: April Kinney

review: My husband loves it and I do too.  Highly recommend!
author: Boog

review: Fantastic piece of hardware.  Picture quality is consistently good.  The menu is easy to navigate, having a remote, versus something like the Chromecast, is a plus.  There are even basic games that can be played on the stick, which is great.  I would have given it five stars except for the fact that although HBO Go is out for fire TV, it is delayed for the fire stick.  That to me is a big over-site of an important content provider.
author: Marc E

review: This is perfect and saves you on your cable bill! Everyone should get it!
author: Shari Johnson
